nodes.text:
Darga the Hutt's palace was a palace on Cato Neimoidia. It was originally owned by a Neimoidian who was a member of the Trade Federation, but he was forced to flee the palace and the Hutt Darga Jiramma Mionne moved in.
He too fled the palace in c. 19 BBY, during the Battle of Darga's palace.
